text: The PGA Tour is a professional golf association. The association is in charge of the professional golf tours in the United States. Its three tours are the PGA Tour, the Champions Tour, and the Web.com Tour. On June 6, 2023, the PGA Tour, PGA European Tour, and Saudi-owned LIV Golf all announced they would be merging, with the Saudi Public Investment Fund becoming the "exclusive investor" and the PGA Tour would have their CEO Jay Monahan appointed along with board members. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Golf Category:Sports organizations of the United States
title: PGA Tour
